Title: Marvin's Room
Overview: A leukemia patient attempts to end a 20-year feud with her sister to get her bone marrow.
Tagline: A story about the years that keep us apart... And the moments that bring us together.
production_companies: Miramax Films, Scott Rudin Productions, Tribeca Productions
Cast: Diane Keaton, Meryl Streep, Leonardo DiCaprio
